SectionHero.headline: Track business expenses and generate invoices in seconds
SectionHero.paragraph: Snap photos of receipts, categorize expenses automatically, and create professional invoices for your clients instantly.

SectionPricing.label: Pricing
SectionPricing.headline: A pricing that adapts to your needs

questions.question: How does receipt scanning work?
questions.answer: Simply take a photo of any receipt with your phone. InvoiceSnap's AI automatically extracts the date, amount, merchant, and items, then categorizes the expense based on your business type.

questions.question: Can I send invoices directly to clients?
questions.answer: Yes, you can create and send professional invoices via email directly from the app. Clients can pay online, and you'll receive automatic payment notifications.

questions.question: Does it integrate with my accounting software?
questions.answer: InvoiceSnap integrates with QuickBooks, Xero, FreshBooks, and most major accounting platforms. You can also export data as CSV for manual import.
